preference.name: ItemRevision_ProcessSimulatePLCInfo_default_relation
preference.preference_description: Specifies the default relation created between the 2 objects, when pasting an object of type "ProcessSimulatePLCInfo" under an Item Revision. It will be the default relation created between the object and the target Item Revision.
